attributes.additional_details: Because xl bully shouldn’t be nanny or muzzle in public. it’s unfair just because this dog has attacked someone, do you really think that chihuahuas haven’t?
attributes.background: Why should we muzzle xl bully’s in public that is like, not letting a kid go to the park, let the dogs free. They didn’t do anything to you, if people don’t want to be bit than don’t go near the dog, it’s that simple.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petitions, which call for similar action:

Bad owners are to blame not the breed - don't ban the XL bully: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/643611

Don’t require muzzles for XL Bullies - Not humane nor fair!
https://moderate.petition.parliament.uk/admin/petitions/644415
